name: Tropical Paradise Smoothie
instructions: 1. Peel and slice the bananas into chunks and place them in the blender.
2. Add the frozen pineapple chunks and frozen mango chunks to the blender as well.
3. Pour in the coconut water and orange juice into the blender.
4. If you prefer a sweeter smoothie, add in the tablespoon of honey. This step is optional, so if you prefer a less sweet smoothie, you can skip the honey.
5. Finally, add the ice cubes to the blender. The ice cubes will help make the smoothie thicker and give it a nice icy texture.
6. Place the lid on the blender tightly and blend all the ingredients together until smooth. This usually takes about 1 to 2 minutes depending on your blender's power.
7. Once the smoothie is well blended and reaches your desired consistency, you can stop blending.
8. Pour the Tropical Paradise Smoothie into serving glasses.
